$ul: **deprovision_groups**: Auto-deprovision group membership based on group memberships on the SSO side?
**enabled**: Is strategy enabled?  This may become automatically set to `false` after a high number and duration of failures.
**label**: Custom label for the SSO provider on the login page.
**ldap_base_dn**: Base DN for looking up users in LDAP server
**ldap_domain**: Domain name that will be appended to LDAP usernames
**ldap_username**: Username for signing in to LDAP server.
**logo_url**: URL holding a custom logo for the SSO provider on the login page.
**provision_attachments_permission**: DEPRECATED: Auto-provisioned users get Sharing permission. Use a Group with the Bundle permission instead.
**provision_company**: Default company for auto provisioned users.
**provision_email_signup_groups**: Comma-separated list of group names whose members will be created with email_signup authentication.
**provision_group_default**: Comma-separated list of group names for groups to automatically add all auto-provisioned users to.
**provision_group_exclusion**: Comma-separated list of group names for groups (with optional wildcards) that will be excluded from auto-provisioning.
**provision_group_inclusion**: Comma-separated list of group names for groups (with optional wildcards) that will be auto-provisioned.
**provision_group_required**: Comma or newline separated list of group names (with optional wildcards) to require membership for user provisioning.
**provision_groups**: Auto-provision group membership based on group memberships on the SSO side?
**provision_site_admin_groups**: Comma-separated list of group names whose members will be created as Site Admins.
**provision_time_zone**: Default time zone for auto provisioned users.
**saml_provider_cert_fingerprint**: Identity provider sha256 cert fingerprint if saml_provider_metadata_url is not available.
**saml_provider_metadata_url**: Metadata URL for the SAML identity provider
**saml_provider_sso_target_url**: Identity provider SSO endpoint if saml_provider_metadata_url is not available.
**scim_oauth_access_token_expires_at**: SCIM OAuth Access Token Expiration Time.
